roleset.name: co-host (as a tv show)
roleset.note: COANCHOR-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on Newswire. No VNcls. (from coanchor.01-v)

example.name: both args
example.text: [The show]-1 will be co-anchored [*-1]by Bernard Shaw and Catherine Crier , a 34 - year - old former Texas judge and campus beauty queen who has never held a job in television or journalism .
example.arg: by Bernard Shaw and Catherine Crier , a 34 - year - old former Texas judge and campus beauty queen who has never held a job in television or journalism
